title: RoboCat
extended_details:
A see-through acrylic robot cat.

Your favorite pet, now available without shedding and litterbox duties.

This beauty will have an onboard computer that controls its very cat-like quadrupedal motion as well as its vision system. It will use a raspberry pi camera and open CV to detect where a laser pointer is pointing towards and follow in its direction.

parts_and_costs.part: Longruner 10Pcs MG90S Metal Geared Micro Servo Motor 9G for Helicopter
Adafruit 16-Channel PWM/Servo-HAT for Pi, MINI KIT (X 1)
SunFounder USB 2.0 Mini Microphone for Raspberry Pi 4 Model B, Module
DIYmall 0.96" Inch I2c IIC Serial 128x64 OLED LCD LED White Display Mo
Clear Scratch UV-Resistant Cast Acrylic Sheet
Portable Phone Charger 10000mAh Quick Charge 2.4 A Power Bank External
Raspberry Pi 4 Model B 2019 Quad Core 64 Bit WiFi Bluetooth (2GB)
